title: Darkest at Dawn
description: In one volume for the first time-a Dark novel and novella from the #1 New York Times bestselling author.For the first time together, two of Christine Feehan's most seductive tales of savage prey and sensual predators: Dark Secret, the story of a vampire hunter on the scent of a human female; and Dark Hunger, which tells of a caged Carpathian, his thirst for vengeance, and his lust for the woman who will release him.
author: Christine Feehan
